jobDescription: LOOKINGGLASS CYBER SOLUTIONS is hiring for an experienced, dynamic and technically versed Software Engineers. This chosen candidate will look to be apart of and support a small software engineering team responsible for assessing requirements, developing use cases, and designing, coding, documenting, debugging and maintaining software applications.  The Software Engineer position requires applicants to be self-driven and work in a distributed team designing and coding high quality customer driven ready to ship solutions. The candidate has strong working knowledge and experience of Agile Software Development and will be responsible for design, coding, and testing of solutions touching on a wide variety of technologies. Strong collaboration skills are a must.
